cards.name: Backfiring Trap
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Lose 3 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blast
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 7 (9) damage to a random enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bonfire
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 15 (18) stslib:Temporary_HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Canned Block
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Next turn,
gain 30 (40) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Forge
cards.description:
Retain.
Increase the damage of all Attacks in your hand by 8 (10) this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Jinx
cards.description: Deal 3 (4) damage~~- . -~~  Apply (and)  (apply) 1 bogwarden:Maledict (to ALL enemies).

cards.name: Shadow Font
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) Block.
Add a Blast (+) into your hand.

cards.name: Snapper Trap
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Deal 10 (14) damage.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Blowpipe
cards.description:
Deal 8 (9) damage.
Put bogwarden:any  (2) Unplayable card (cards) into your hand.

cards.name: Blunderbuss
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Deals 3 (5) additional damage for each Retain card in your hand.

cards.name: Bola Toss
cards.description:
Deal 2 (3) damage.
Apply 2 (3) bogwarden:Constricted.

cards.name: Bushwhack
cards.description: Gain 6 (7) Block. If you have played less than 18 (20) cards this combat, gain 2 (3) Plated Armor.

cards.name: Dark Pact
cards.description: Gain 2 (4) temporary bogwarden:Mojo.

cards.name: Eagle Eyes
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Scry 2 for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Entangling Vines
cards.description: Apply 2 (3) Weak and bogwarden:Snared.

cards.name: Incantation
cards.description:
Scry 2.
If all cards were discarded, add 1 (2) Blast (Blasts) into your hand.

cards.name: Plague of Toads
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy 4 (5) times.

cards.name: Pressure Plate
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Apply 6 (8) Mark.
ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

cards.name: Shank
cards.description:
Deal 12 (17) damage.
Discard the rightmost card in your hand.

cards.name: Snare Trap
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Apply 8 (12) bogwarden:Snared.

cards.name: Snip
cards.description:
Retain.
Trigger your leftmost bogwarden:Trap.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Submerge
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Add a Void into your discard pile.

cards.name: The Rumble
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage to ALL enemies.
bogwarden:Big_Game: Repeat.

cards.name: Vile Powder
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Apply 1 bogwarden:Maledict to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Viper Strike
cards.description:
Apply 1 bogwarden:Venom.
Deal 2 (4) damage twice.

cards.name: Watch and Learn
cards.description:
Gain 10 (12) Block.
Trigger your 2 (3) leftmost bogwarden:Traps.

cards.name: Acid Cloud
cards.description:
Apply 3 (5) bogwarden:Snared and bogwarden:Venom to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Attunement
cards.description: Gain 2 bogwarden:Mojo. (Apply 1 Maledict to ALL enemies.)

cards.name: Bag and Tag
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Trigger your leftmost bogwarden:Trap twice.

cards.name: Barbed Lasso
cards.description:
Deal 6 (7) damage.
Apply 5 (7) bogwarden:Snared.
bogwarden:Big_Game: When it wears off, apply 3 (4) more.

cards.name: Bewitch
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage.
Whenever you apply a debuff to this enemy, gain 3 (4) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bide Time
cards.description: For X turns, gain 9 (12) Block at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Blending In
cards.description: At the end of your turn, if you played no Attacks, gain  (3 Block and) 1 bogwarden:Blur.

cards.name: Bramble Shield
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) Block.
Gain temporary bogwarden:Spines equal to your Block.

cards.name: Broiling Flames
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) damage to ALL enemies.
Add a Burn into your hand.

cards.name: Cage of Serpents
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Apply 1 (2) bogwarden:Venom.
Enemy loses 1 HP 3 (4) times.

cards.name: Cruel Schemes
cards.description: Whenever a card is Retained, gain 2 (3) Block.

cards.name: Darkvision
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Scry 3. If you discard at least 2 (1) cards (card) this way, gain [E].

cards.name: Flock of Bats
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 2 (3) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Geyser
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Add 1 (2) Blast (Blasts) into your hand.

cards.name: Hair Trigger
cards.description:
Deal 6 (10) damage.
Lose 2 HP.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Hoodwink
cards.description:
stslib:Snecko.
Deal 5 (7) damage to a random enemy a number of times equal to this card's cost + 2.
cards.flavor: The ol' beehive-to-the-head trick: unreliable, unpredictable, but so funny to watch.

cards.name: Hurl
cards.description:
Trigger bogwarden:any bogwarden:Trap
on an enemy. (Unless it Exhausted, return it to your hand.)

cards.name: Implode
cards.description:
Gain 12 (14) Block and 1 bogwarden:Blur.
A random enemy gains 14 (10) Block and 1 bogwarden:Blur.

cards.name: Jar of Spiders
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies. They lose 3 (6) HP at the start of their next turn.

cards.name: Line Up
cards.description:
Scry 4 (5).
Next turn, gain [E] ( [E]).

cards.name: Portents
cards.description: Whenever a card is discarded via Scry, gain 3 (4) Block.

cards.name: Restless Spirits
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, add a Blast into your hand.

cards.name: Ritual Totem
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Heal 3 (6) HP.
Gain 1 bogwarden:Mojo.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sap
cards.description: Gain [E] for each unique debuff the enemy has.

cards.name: Sinister Ritual
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Next turn, heal 8 (11) HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spinning Blades
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies 2 (3) times.

cards.name: Spiteful Staff
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Apply 1 (2) bogwarden:Maledict.
Apply 1 (2) bogwarden:Venom.

cards.name: Stalker
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If discarded via Scry, play this and increase its damage by 5 (8).

cards.name: Stickerbush Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
Gain 5 (7) bogwarden:Spines.

cards.name: Survey
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
For each Skill drawn, gain 5 (7) Block.

cards.name: Tripwire
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Next turn, draw 1 (2) additional card (cards).
Gain 50% more Block from cards for 2 turns.

cards.name: Urticating Spines
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) bogwarden:Spines.
Gain 1 (2) Dexterity.

cards.name: Vengeful Totem
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Whenever this enemy loses HP, gain 2 (3) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Walkabout
cards.description:
Scry 3 (4).
Draw 1 card for each card discarded.

cards.name: Warding Totem
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Gain 3 (5) Plated Armor.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Boulder Trap
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
First trigger does nothing, then deal 25 (30) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Briar Patch
cards.description:
Gain 6 (10) bogwarden:Spines.
Whenever you are attacked, deal damage back equal to 50% of your total bogwarden:Spines.

cards.name: Camp Out
cards.description:
Choose Bonfire (+) or Forge (+) to add into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Corpse Flies
cards.description:
Deal 7 (8) damage.
 (Draw 1 card.)
If Fatal, permanently (add) Upgrade (a) this (Corpse) card (Flies to your deck).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Death Ward
cards.description: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3 (4) times.

cards.name: Friends
cards.description:
Gain 1 bogwarden:Buffer.
Next turn, gain 1 Intangible. In 2 turns, lose 3 Max HP.

cards.name: Incarcerate
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage X times.
Trigger your leftmost bogwarden:Trap X (+!M!) times.

cards.name: Nature's Wrath
cards.description: Deal 6 (8) damage to ALL enemies for each of your unique buffs.

cards.name: Night Terror
cards.description:
Apply 99 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
 (Gain 5 Vigor.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Othersider Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 (3) bogwarden:Mojo and lose 1 Strength.

cards.name: Poison Nova
cards.description: *Blasts apply 2 (3) Poison.

cards.name: Rabbit Punch
cards.description: Deal 15 (20) damage.

cards.name: Refined Blast
cards.description:
Retain.
A random enemy loses 10 (12) HP. Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sludge Bomb
cards.description:
bogwarden:Trap.
ALL enemies lose 6 (8) HP and 2 (3) Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spiritual Journey
cards.description:
Raise your Max HP by 4 (6). The next 2 (4) times you play an Attack, lose 1 Max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unstable Concoction
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage. Obtain
an Explosive (bogwarden:Explosive_Potion+.)
~~- Potion. -~~
bogwarden:Big_Game: Obtain a Fire (bogwarden:Fire_Potion+) ~~- Potion  -~~ instead.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wild Magic
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Transform bogwarden:any 3 cards into  (Upgraded) cards of any color.

relics.name: Du-Vu Needle
relics.description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 bogwarden:Mojo. Upon pickup, obtain a Doll's Curse.
relics.flavorText: The bog-dwelling shamans use these to lay powerful curses.

relics.name: Swamp Talisman
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, draw 1 card and gain 2 temporary bogwarden:Mojo.
relics.flavorText: A ward against the many evils of the Foglands.

relics.name: Purple Rose
relics.flavorText: "Beautiful, but very prickly - OUCH!!! See what I mean!?" - Ranwid

relics.name: Paper Crokh
relics.description: Enemies with bogwarden:Maledict take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: The paper is warm to the touch.

relics.name: Trail Cam
relics.description: The first time you draw a bogwarden:Trap each combat, trigger it and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: A strange gadget that won't turn on. What was its use?

relics.name: Exile Roster
relics.description: At the start of Boss and Elite combats, apply 3 bogwarden:Maledict and bogwarden:Venom to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A list of those forbidden to ever leave the Foglands.

relics.name: Primordial Focus
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 2 Blasts+ into your hand.

relics.name: Glove of Zapping
relics.flavorText: Some Du-Vu spirits disguise themselves as ordinary objects, in search of prey.

relics.name: Jasper Talisman
relics.description: Replaces Swamp Talisman. The first 3 times you draw an Unplayable card each combat, draw 1 card and gain 1 bogwarden:Mojo.
relics.flavorText: A menacing carving, crafted by a sister of the Foglands.

relics.name: Rusty Ol' Clunker
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle a Backfiring Trap into your draw pile.

relics.name: Tinning Kit
relics.description: The first time you draw a Curse or Status card each combat, Exhaust it and add a Canned Block into your hand.
relics.flavorText: To survive in the wild, you have to be willing to eat anything.

potions.name: Pact Potion
potions.description: Gain 5 Mojo. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Mojo.

potions.name: Bottle of Tricks
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Traps to add to your hand. Trigger all Traps in your hand.

keywords.name: Any
keywords.description: From your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

keywords.name: Big Game
keywords.description: Effect applies during Boss and Elite combats.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Buffer
keywords.description: Prevents the next time you would lose HP.

keywords.name: Constricted
keywords.description: Constricted creatures take damage at the END of their turn.

keywords.name: Drained
keywords.description: While Drained, you deal 25% less non-attack damage.

keywords.name: Maledict
keywords.description: Enemies with Maledict take 50% more non-attack damage.

keywords.name: Ocean
keywords.description: Ocean is free! Ocean is free! Woohoo!

keywords.name: Snared
keywords.description: Snared creatures deal less damage until after their next attack.

keywords.name: Spines
keywords.description: Whenever an enemy doesn't attack, deals damage. Deals half damage against attacks with other effects.

keywords.name: Trap
keywords.description: Unplayable Retaining cards. The leftmost Trap in your hand is triggered when you lose HP. If from an enemy attack, targets the attacker.

keywords.name: Venom
keywords.description: Enemies affected by Venom lose 2 HP whenever they take damage.

mods.name: Bogwarden (The)
mods.credits: Full credits for Beta Art and SFX can be found on the Steam workshop page.
mods.description: a slay the spire character! surprise!
